duties_responsibilities.duty: Provides nursing care to assigned residents/patients, following the care plan and adhering to the standards of care.
Manages the environment to maintain resident/patient safety and supervises the resident/patient care activity performance by nursing assistants.
Performs duties as defined by the State Nurse Practice Act and follows all center policies and procedures.
Utilizes necessary supplies and equipment, calculates drug dosage, and meets all health requirements imposed by law.
Relates positively, effectively, and appropriately with residents, families, community members, volunteers, and other center staff.
Demonstrates basic computer knowledge and ability with an aptitude to learn company applications.

education_certification.credential: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) certification and current CPR certification
